Activity: Check emails and project management system. Review any feedback from @lpro-1 on the integration plan or alternative tool evaluations.

Continue working on the comprehensive integration plan for the chosen tool. This should include detailed instructions for setting up and configuring the tool, as well as best practices for using it in different development workflows.
Start creating a series of training materials for the development team. This could include written documentation, video tutorials, or live demonstrations.
Lunch Break. Read up on new features in unreal Engine.
If the alternative tool is being evaluated, continue the integration process with a more complex test project. Document the process and any challenges encountered.

Based on feedback from @beng-1 and @tart-1, prioritize specific aspects of build automation or asset management for further investigation. Potentially research scripting languages or APIs that could be used to automate these tasks.

Finalize the training materials and integration plan for the chosen tool, or document the progress on the alternative tool evaluation. Prepare for a potential demonstration or presentation to the development team.
